turnMgmt(String) - Static method in class it.polimi.ingsw.cli.CommandLine
turnMgmt manages every action that can be done during the user's turn; it receives a Json containing the game state, deserializes it and interacts with the user to ask him what action he wants to perform, invoking methods accordingly
turnMgmt(String, Client) - Static method in class it.polimi.ingsw.cli.CommandLine
overload for actual usage (implements connections)
this method handles all the turn actions a player can make, and is in constant communication with the server by sending actions and receiving gameUpdates.

TypeOfResourceToInt(TypeOfResource) - Static method in class it.polimi.ingsw.utils.StaticMethods
method that convert a type of resource to an int (that is used as an index for vectors). it uses the usual alphabetical distribution for coins through stones, starting from 0 to 3. it returns -1 if the resource is faith
